com.atmecs.falcon.automation.db.sql

Class MSSQLServerDBService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atmecs.falcon.automation.db.sql.MSSQLServerDBService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBConnector

    public class MSSQLServerDBService
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBConnector
    MSSQLServerDBConnector Class implements DBConnector Interface. Creates Connection with MicroSoft SQL Server Database. Provides basic CRUD Operations.
    Author:
    nv092106
